description: '''Guitarrada''', also called '''lambada instrumental''' ("instrumental [[lambada]]"), is an [[Instrumental music|instrumental]] musical genre that emerged in the state of [[Pará]], [[Brazil]], originating from the fusion of [[choro]] with [[carimbó]], [[Merengue music|merengue]], [[cumbia]], [[Mambo (music)|mambo]], [[bolero]], [[Jovem Guarda]], [[Brega (music)|brega]], among others. In this style, the [[electric guitar]] is predominantly solo.
